text: Emilia Clarke appeared on NBC's Late Night with Seth Myers on Tuesday, where she shared her everything from her experience meeting Prince William, to how her mother is ruining her sex life. Yes, seriously! Clarke, who on top of playing Daenerys Targaryen in Game of Thrones, also plays Qi'ra in Solo : A Star Wars Story, talked about her mother's collection of merchandise. ` ` I think she knows it gets to me slightly â€” as it would to anyone when your mother really enjoys having your face on cushions... and throws. Now, Star Wars is here with a vengeance. There's a lot of merchandise that comes along with being in a Star Wars movie, so there's a lot of stuff that mum can fill my house with!'' she
